description: Makes your loud friends shut up.
name: AutoDeafen

default_enabled.name: Enabled By Default
default_enabled.description: Whether AutoDeafen is <co>enabled by default</c> when you load into a level for the first time. Basically enables AutoDeafen globally rather than per-level.

default_percentage.name: Default Percentage
default_percentage.description: The <co>default percentage to deafen at</c> when you load into a level for the first time.

practice.name: Enabled In Practice Mode
practice.description: Whether AutoDeafen should be enabled during practice mode. Dunno why you'd ever want this, but it's there if you do.
